events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the Software Engineer position submitted via our careers portal.
John Doe's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and developer found in his resume.
Recruiter Alice Johnson has been assigned to oversee John Doe's recruitment process for the Software Engineer role.
The initial screening call with John Doe went well; he demonstrated a solid understanding of software development principles.
John Doe responded promptly to the interview invitation and confirmed his availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview for John Doe has been scheduled on 2024-05-22 at 13:00 UTC, focusing on backend development tasks.
